description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Storm, Tearing

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Storm Bolter of the Angels of Vengeance Chapter. Wielder is immune to fear however if they ever retreat from battle they suffer -10 to their Willpower Characteristic for the rest of the mission.
